gameplay.gameobject

Class GameActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.gameobject.GameObject
      • gameplay.gameobject.GameActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Balloon, Bomberman, Doll, Kondoria, Minvo, Oneal, Ovapi, Pass, Pontan

    public class GameActor
extends GameObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implenting class for the abstract GameObject class. Implements features associated with moveable game actor objects. Each GameActor is responsible to manage it's own state, it checks if it has been killed and if is has raises a flag for the game engine to remove it from play.
    Author:
    mfong8
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        Returns:
